fulltext:
Tran Tuan
Developer
0937704547  Male 
tuantranlhu@gmail.com  21/01/1994 
BienHoa, Vietnam

Summary
I'm a fullstack developer with 3 years experience (include C# .Net and Front-End development) with good
knowledge of Software Development process and Object Oriented Programming. I'm a quick learner and
passionate about learning new languages and technologies.

Skills
- Frontend: Angular, VueJS, Jquery, Javascript, HTML/CSS.
- Backend: C#, .NET Framework, ASP.NET MVC, Web API, EF.
- Tools: Git, SourceTree.
- Be able to work and participate in technical discussions in English.
- Teamwork and learning required skill in project.

PETRONAS ICT SDN BHD
Aug 2018 - Present
Work experience
Fullstack Developer
Project: UHSE Online 
Description: To capture all Unsafe Act, Unsafe Condition and Safety Observation data for all business
units under Upstream. Beside gathers and manages UAUC report, it also monitors Near Miss (NM) cases.
Responsibilities:
 - Coding new function and workflow
 - Improve perfomance
Technologies: 
 - ASP.NET MVC 5
 - AJax + Jquery
 - SQL Server
Project: myHSE 2.0 
Description: Malaysia Petroleum Management (MPM) is a regulatory body in PETRONAS, responsible to
manage and steer the overall Upstream activities in Malaysia. One of the roles is governing the Health,
Safety, Security & Environment (HSSE) areas in Upstream operation which includes incident and HSE
performance reporting by PAC.
Responsibilities:
 - Design database and structure
 - Coding function and workflow
 - Integrate data from others sytem
 - Improve perfomance
Technologies:
 - Web API
 - .NET Framework
 - VueJS + Javascript
 - SQL Server
FPT SOFTWARE
Mar 2018 - Jul 2018

Developer
Project: ARK – Agricultural Research Knowledgebase
Description: Write automation test for modules
Technologies:
 - Selenium
 - ASP.NET C#
DONG A CS
Jul 2016 - Feb 2018
Developer
Project: Inspection Management
Description: Build a website that handle and process all the duplicate company inspections in 1 year
Responsibilities:
 - User Requirement
 - Design database
 - Coding function and bug fixing
Technologies:
 - ASP.NET MVC
 - Jquery + Boostrap + Ajax
 - SQL Server
Project: Inner Department Management
Decription: Help the goverment manage staff, training, annual reward and export statistics
Responsibilities:
 - User Requirement
 - Design database
 - Coding function and bug fixing
 - Deloy and training user
Technologies:
 - ASP.NET MVC
 - Jquery + Boostrap + Ajax
 - SQL Server

LACHONG UNIVERSITY
Jun 2012 - Dec 2016
Education
Major: Computer Software Engineering
